page.title: 09A POLICEMAN IN HORTON
page.content: This morning we had a country policeman to school and he told us what it would be like to be a policeman.When he was a boy he wanted to be a policeman and I wouldn't mind to be one as well. The Police car is called a panda car because of the stripes down it, and the policeman are called bobbies because the man who invented police was called Robert.The number on the shoulder of a policeman is if they do naughty things they can be found.I am quite glad of policemen and women otherwise the world would be in a state. The Police Constable liked his job very much.He can go to schools to talk to children and show them how to ride their bikes carefully and teach them the Highway Code. He has also been in a couple of fights in his time. Duncan
